players.name: Alice
memory:
You: "
I am innocent and saw Bob with the detective last night. "
Charlie: "I think the detective is the mafioso. We should lynch him."
Diana: "Charlie, I think Alice is the mafioso. She said she saw me with Bob last night, but that's not true. We didn't even talk to each other."
